title: The Curious Case of the Alexander McQueen Graffiti Skirt
description: What happens when brands and art collide? Or the story of Alexander McQueen and Adam Pendleton.
dc:creator: Vanessa Friedman
media:credit: Lelanie Foster for The New York Times
media:description: The artist Adam Pendleton in front of “Everything,” part of his monumental “Who is Queen?” installation at MoMA, and an example of his signature work.
